title: Muller-November-Revolution 1918(how Germans lost WW1)(1978)
description:
For english-only speaking:
This book is in german language. English title would be: November revolution 1918 - Betrayal or a legend of betrayal? (1978). Did the Germans loose World War 1 because of inside revolutionary forces instigated a gigantic betrayal or was it all just a myth as it taught in schools? Gerhard Muller puts history back to facts as he explains how the revolutionaries inside Germany managed to force the Wehrmacht to lay down their weapons and face the humilliating defeat and Versailles treaty. Called the November revolution 1918 it created the necessary atmosphere that later led straight to World war 2. Find out the hidden history behind the German defeat in World war 1. 55 pages.
